caption: Itâ€™s a part of a movie. The theme of the movie is spy and agent. Three men and a woman take a car to a place. The weather is nice and through the window is the mountain covered by snow. At the same time, a man is setting a bomb. They get out of the car and another man and woman greet them. They seem to be familiar with each other. A man stays and talks with the man and the woman, and the remaining three person is trying to find something. They finally find a bomb and they try to solve it. They seem very nervous.
